name: Cristina Da Milano
membership:
ICOM membership (http://www.icom-italia.org/)
Teatro di Roma cda (http://www.teatrodiroma.net/)
goal:
After a degree in Archaeology and a MA in Museum Studies, I have been working in the cultural field, carrying out studies, consultancies and training activities at a national and European level.
Since 2010 I am president of ECCOM-European Centre for Cultural Organisation and Management (www.eccom.it).
interests: Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs
euInitiatives: Since 2003 I have been working on the issue of culture as a means of social inclusion and lifelong learning processes within informal contexts and I have been involved in several EU funded projects.
